messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: D gree or D ploma of Your Choice
messages.msgSnippet: The easiest solution is for the moderator to switch the list to Moderate New Members . Then unmoderate people once they post and reveal themselves to be
messages.messageBody:
The easiest solution is for the moderator to
switch the list to "Moderate New Members". Then
unmoderate people once they post and reveal
themselves to be actual Nihonto enthusiasts. I
moderate a couple of lists on Yahoo!, and that's
about the only approach that works against spammers. My 2 cents...

Best,

Andres
